title: Classic Teemo voice while using the Omega Squad Teemo skin.
body:
While playing as twisted treeline match, I was using Teemo with the Omega Squad skin, and I was matched against someone using a classic Teemo skin. It started normally enough but about the 20 minute mark I started to notice that sometimes when clicking to move, instead of saying one of the depressing Omega skin lines, I instead heard "Armed and Ready" in the voice from classic teemo. Considering this line is a movement line and cannot be heard by enemies it's quite safe to say it shouldn't happen.

Step by Step recreation:
1. Play twisted treeline (don't know if it's map specific).
2. Play as Omega Squad Teemo, play against a Teemo in classic skin.
3. click to move.

This occurred about once for every 2-3 Omega Squad Teemo lines
If it's needed the full list of champions used in the match were;

Blue Team:
Omega Squad Teemo
Soraka
Lunar Goddess Diana

Red Team:
Wukong
Teemo
Miss Fortune

replies.body:
Sometimes I think that tends to happen more often than not...

Sometimes I hear lines from Jhin that aren't supposed to happen.

Maybe you're insane and Jhin is actually alright.

Do you hear them after stepping on his traps?  They actually have voiceover lines associated with them.
Nope, once was his ally, we were both araming mid lane in the Rift against the enemy and then I heard him say "Smile! Everyone is watching!" as if expecting me to behave in combat.
I think you're supposed to hear that.
Still odd, assumed that you should only hear lines if you step on his flower or if he shoots.

yeah happened to me today also they had a classic teemo and i was playing os teemo, all the lines that were messed up were the one's teemo says for movement, like hak 2 3 4 or ill scout ahead, those lines were normal teemo voice and not omega squad, rest of the sfx were omega squad, its annoying :p

Hey SHIA LABE0UF -

Thanks for the report! This is an audio theft bug, due to having an Omega Squad Teemo in the game, as well as a base Teemo. We've been looking into this for a bit, but we haven't had luck in nailing down exactly when this is occurring/what lines.

As a note, this isn't map specific, so this will occur on any map.

Would you happen to remember any specific lines that were playing?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=8QVqZEPA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-19T17:29:33.667+0000)

I know I'm highjacking this thread but can you please take a look at my thread? Quinn has a really major bug introduced in 6.7, and it wasn't fixed and she is pretty much unplayable right now I'm not even playing the game because the bug is impossible to work around and she's the only champ I play.
